atariCore

Interface FileManager


  • public interface FileManager
    Handles needed file streams.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String fieldSeparator
      Separator used to store data in file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addNewScoreToLeaderboards(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String playerName, int Score, int lvl)
      Adds new score to the leaderboards.
      static int getPlayerLevel(java.lang.String filePath, java.lang.String name)
      Gets player's current level.
      static java.awt.Image loadImage(java.lang.String filename, int scaleFactor)
      Loads image from specified path and returns it scaled with specified factor.

      Reads the file of the given path.

      Sends player's score to be recorded in leaderboards file.

      Writes the given data into the specified file path.

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> readFile(java.lang.String path)
        Reads the file of the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of required file.
        Returns:
        Array list of strings which represent the content of the file.

      • writeFile

        static void writeFile(java.lang.String path,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> data,
                      boolean append)
        Writes the given data into the specified file path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the specified file.
        data - Array list of strings which represent the to be written data.
        append - States whether to append to the current content of file or clears it then write.

      • addNewScoreToLeaderboards

        static void addNewScoreToLeaderboards(java.lang.String path,
                                      java.lang.String playerName,
                                      int Score,
                                      int lvl)
        Adds new score to the leaderboards.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of leaderboards file.
        playerName - Holds player's name.
        Score - Holds player's score.
        lvl - Holds player's scored level.

      • getPlayerLevel

        static int getPlayerLevel(java.lang.String filePath,
                          java.lang.String name)
        Gets player's current level. (if needed)
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of leaderboards file.
        name - Name of required player used to load current player's profile.
        Returns:
        Player's current level.

      • sendPlayerScore

        static void sendPlayerScore(java.lang.String filePath,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            int level)
        Sends player's score to be recorded in leaderboards file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of leaderboards file.
        name - Player's name.
        level - Player's level.

      • loadImage

        static java.awt.Image loadImage(java.lang.String filename,
                                int scaleFactor)
        Loads image from specified path and returns it scaled with specified factor.
        Parameters:
        filename - Image path.
        scaleFactor - Scale factor.
        Returns:
        Image with specified scale and path.
